title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Jupyter Notebooks: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Jupyter Notebooks. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Jupyter Notebooks? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Jupyter Notebooks
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Jupyter Notebooks (ml frameworks) is Jupyter Notebooks is an open-source web application that allows users to create and share documents containing live code, equations, visualizations, and narrative text. Its key capability is interactive, exploratory computing, enabling users to run code in multiple programming languages (like Python, R, Julia) in a cell-based environment and see results immediately. It is uniquely powerful for data science, scientific research, and education due to its blend of executable code, rich media output, and explanatory text in a single, shareable document.. Users choose it for open-source, interactive-computing, data-science.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Jupyter Notebooks: Cell-based execution of code in over 40 programming languages via kernels, Inline display of rich outputs: plots, images, HTML, LaTeX, Markdown, Integration with major data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn)

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Jupyter Notebooks are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Jupyter Notebooks for open-source.
